title: Can't login?
body:
I can't sign in today. It says "Unable to connect to the login queue". This happened a few hours ago, then I restart my client and login successfully. Got a chest, go to loot then it says some error occurred. I tried to re-login but it failed. Asked my friends to log in and none of them logged in successfully. I've also tried to log into na server which also failed. Any ideas how to fix this?
Sorry for bad English

replies.body:
I just have found a method to log in if u have problem "Unable to connect to the login queue". I just have played 2 games, so far no problem at all. We only have problem of login, we are fine for playing games so here is the method. But this method only suitable for user whose computer has WIFI.

1. Disconnect your LAN or pull the wire off if u r LAN user, and connect ur computer to "Personal Hotpot" of ur phone by WIFI
2. Open LOL and login, u will find that ur able to login
3. Disconnect Personal Hotpot then connect LAN or the WIFI u used to use
4. Wait client to reconnect then u r ready to go!
U will need to repeat dis method every single time u log in

GLHF!

We're aware of a problem that is causing some players to have problems logging on to League. Can you please check out t[his post and follow the troubleshooting instructions](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/GNIFyg6h-login-issues-july-13th?comment=0006)? This will help us to get this resolved as quickly as possible.
I even reinstalled my game, still not working
